holidays.title: National Mustard Day
holidays.description: Ground from the seeds of a mustard plant, mustard is one of America’s favorite condiments.

holidays.title: Blogger Day
holidays.description: If you have created a blog before, you should be celebrating Blogger Day.

holidays.title: Burkina Faso Independence Day
holidays.description: Read on till you know all you need about Burkina Faso Independence Day.

holidays.title: Mead Day
holidays.description: Get your glasses ready to drink up all things incredible about mead.

holidays.title: National Couscous Day
holidays.description: Get ready to savor and have your fill of couscous in all its forms!

holidays.title: National Dash Cam Day
holidays.description: Dash cams have made telling your stories easier than ever. Learn more!

holidays.title: National Disc Golf Day
holidays.description: Celebrate America's fourth-largest sport in style, with some fun ideas we have for you.

holidays.title: National Jamaican Patty Day
holidays.description: Check out these awesome ideas to satisfy your Jamaican patty cravings and honor the dish too!

holidays.title: National Oyster Day
holidays.description: Slurp up these great ideas to celebrate the day with a couple of oysters.

holidays.title: National Twins Day
holidays.description: We show you how easy it is to celebrate the twins in your life.

holidays.title: National Underwear Day
holidays.description: Let us just brief-ly tell why we love underwear.

holidays.title: Our Lady of Africa
holidays.description: Go all out, and join Ceuta to celebrate our Lady of Africa today.

holidays.title: Sandcastle Day
holidays.description: Come on, let's head to the beach! It's a perfect day to build sandcastles!

holidays.title: Work Like a Dog Day
holidays.description: This quirky day is inspired by the reputed strong work ethic of canines, especially service dogs.

holidays.title: Cookiee Kawaii’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is the creator of several TikTok sensations. Celebrate her special day with us!

holidays.title: Elyse Dehlbom’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality T.V. Star has eight adorable puppies! Celebrate her special day with us!

holidays.title: Gohan Son’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber is fluent in English and Korean and is charming as well!

holidays.title: Ja'net Dubois’s Birthday
holidays.description: The contributions of this legendary performer to the entertainment world will last an eternity!

holidays.title: Lolo Jones’s Birthday
holidays.description: This outstanding athlete is doing exceptionally well for herself! Celebrate her special day today!

holidays.title: Neil Armstrong’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has become a symbol of what’s possible for human exploration and discovery.

holidays.title: Yungblud’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate Yungblud who initially struggled to fit in but now has a solid fan base.
